member.name: T:NStub.CSharp.Tests.CSharpCodeGeneratorTest
member.summary: This class exercises all major functionality found in the CSharpCodeGenerator class.

member.name: M:NStub.CSharp.Tests.CSharpCodeGeneratorTest.TestFixtureSetUp
member.summary: Performs the intial setup for the entire test fixture. Sets our output directory to a valid, temporary path.

member.name: M:NStub.CSharp.Tests.CSharpCodeGeneratorTest.TestFixtureTearDown
member.summary: Performs the final tear down after all tests in the test fixture have executed. Removes our output directory from the system.

member.name: M:NStub.CSharp.Tests.CSharpCodeGeneratorTest.SetUp
member.summary: Performs the setup prior to the execution of each test.

member.name: M:NStub.CSharp.Tests.CSharpCodeGeneratorTest.CodeNamespaceTest
member.summary: Ensures that the CodeNamespace property has been properly set on our code generator.

member.name: M:NStub.CSharp.Tests.CSharpCodeGeneratorTest.OutputDirectoryTest
member.summary: Ensures that the OutputDirectory property has been properly set on our code generator.

member.name: M:NStub.CSharp.Tests.CSharpCodeGeneratorTest.GenerateCodeTest
member.summary: Ensures that the code generator can perform its code generation without failure.

member.name: T:NStub.CSharp.Tests.CSharpProjectGeneratorTest
member.summary: This class exercises all major functionality of the CSharpProjectGenerator module.

member.name: M:NStub.CSharp.Tests.CSharpProjectGeneratorTest.TestFixtureSetUp
member.summary: Performs the initial setup for the entire test fixture. Sets our output directory to a valid, temporary path.

member.name: M:NStub.CSharp.Tests.CSharpProjectGeneratorTest.TestFixtureTearDown
member.summary: Performs the final cleanup following execution of all of the tests. If the temporary output directory still exists, it will be removed.

member.name: M:NStub.CSharp.Tests.CSharpProjectGeneratorTest.SetUp
member.summary: Performs the initial setup prior to execution of each test.

member.name: M:NStub.CSharp.Tests.CSharpProjectGeneratorTest.ClassFilesTest
member.summary: Ensures that the ClassFiles property is set correctly on our instance of the project generator.

member.name: M:NStub.CSharp.Tests.CSharpProjectGeneratorTest.OutputDirectoryTest
member.summary: Ensures that the OutputDirectory is set correctly on our instance of the project generator.

member.name: M:NStub.CSharp.Tests.CSharpProjectGeneratorTest.ProjectNameTest
member.summary: Ensures that the ProjectName is set correctly on our instance of the project generator.

member.name: M:NStub.CSharp.Tests.CSharpProjectGeneratorTest.ReferencedAssemblies
member.summary: Ensures that the ReferencedAssemblies property is set correctly on our instance of the project generator.

member.name: M:NStub.CSharp.Tests.CSharpProjectGeneratorTest.GenerateProjectFileTest
member.summary: Ensures that our instance of the project generator can perform generation of the project file without fail.
